annotations:
to chartering dept
need named vsl wz offer to fix
1) tweendeck dwt 17-25k—china / baltic
—lumpsm $ 2.5 million
—tweendeck dwt 17-25k
—2 china / 2 baltic
—sep 15-20
—invite bst Lifo
—cqd / 10 wwds sshex
—part ondeck, part stackable
—com 3.75
2) ncsa, eafrica, se.asia / china
—max 50,000mt iron ore ( try 1-6 csv)
—venezuela / tianjin, china
loading port :
1sb ferrominera at mile 44
+ 1sb serpent mouth to load 25,000 mt
completing loading by sts at anchorage
upto max 50,000 mt total
—laycan ppt onwards for 1 st voyage
subsequent monthly with dates to be narrowed
down to 10 days spread to be mutually agreed
—l/d rate: 20 wwd shinc/ 6 wwd shinc
—freight in ite bst lumpsum fios basis 1/1
—freight payment:
25 % by t/t   upon signing vcp
25 % against master nor tat venezuela
50 % upon completion loading & signing b/l
—demurrage / hd
—grd max 24 years, iacs try non-iacs
—only headows or wellknow/big disponent ows
—com 3.75
—fiost usd 38
—10,000mt mineral
—durban / tianjin, china
—sep 1 onwards
—4000/4000
—invite bst fio
—com 2.5
—m/m 30,000mt mineral
—kendawangan, Indonesia/ SChina.
—sep 1-10 try vsl date
—8000/8000 pwwd shinc bends
—inviste bst fio
—grd vsl
—com 2.5
3) emed, eafrica / wci
—fios usd 30 pmt
—16-20,000mt pulses in 50kg bag, sf 1.4
—nacala, mozambique / mumbai, india
—aug 25-sep 5
—l/d rate 500mt per hook
—invite bst fios
—com 3.75
—fiost usd 30
—30-60k mineral
—tripoli, lebanon / wci
—5000/7000
—invite bst fio
—grd vsl
—com 3.75
b.rgds/tang
river ocean shipping limited
tel:0086-411-39756008
fax:0086-411-39756009
